// Pivot 0, 0
int left flipper[20] = {
	9, 2,
	16, 2,
	61, 37,
	70, 45,
	69, 50,
	65, 53,
	58, 53,
	1, 19,
	1, 8,
	9, 2
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float left flipper[20] = {
	0.128571f, 0.037736f,
	0.228571f, 0.037736f,
	0.871429f, 0.698113f,
	1.000000f, 0.849057f,
	0.985714f, 0.943396f,
	0.928571f, 1.000000f,
	0.828571f, 1.000000f,
	0.014286f, 0.358491f,
	0.014286f, 0.150943f,
	0.128571f, 0.037736f
